actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A joint resolution expressing the sense of Congress that amounts paid by the Veterans' Administration to veterans with service-connected disabilities as compensation for such disabilities should remain exempt from Federal income tax.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that veterans' disability compensation payments should remain exempt from Federal income taxation.

titles.title: A joint resolution expressing the sense of Congress that amounts paid by the Veterans' Administration to veterans with service-connected disabilities as compensation for such disabilities should remain exempt from Federal income tax.
